tasks.task: Prepare and plant seeds in the garden.
subtasks: Hold and open seed packet.
Remove seeds from packet.
Align row markers with intended planting rows.
Scoop soil into planting area.
Create furrows or holes for seeds.
Place seeds into furrows or holes.
Cover seeds with soil.
Firm the soil over the planted seeds.
Water the newly planted area.
Mark the planted rows to prevent future cultivation interference.

tasks.task: Transplant established seedlings into the garden.
subtasks: Select healthy seedlings from the nursery or greenhouse.
Prepare soil in planting area.
Make small holes or trenches in soil for seedlings.
Gently remove seedlings from trays or pots.
Insert seedlings into prepared holes or trenches.
Fill around seedlings with soil, pressing gently.
Water transplanted seedlings to settle soil.

tasks.task: Operate a ride-on mower for lawn care.
subtasks: Navigate the mower to the lawn area.
Position the mower correctly for cutting.
Start the mower engine.
Adjust mower height for appropriate cutting length.
Begin mowing, moving the mower smoothly.
Pay attention to direction to avoid missing spots or overlapping.
Handle the steering to turn the mower around corners.
Stop the mower and shut off the engine safely.

tasks.task: Milk a cow.
subtasks: Approach the cow and check for readiness.
Secure the cow near the milking station.
Clean the cow's udder.
Attach the milking apparatus.
Apply gentle pressure to stimulate milk letdown.
Collect milk in the container.
Monitor milk quality and cow comfort.
Remove the milking apparatus and clean the cow.

tasks.task: Feed and care for a young goat.
subtasks: Gather feed supplies (e.g., hay, grain).
Prepare feeding areas ( bowls or containers).
Distribute feed to the goat.
Monitor the goat's eating habits and health.
Provide clean water.
Check for any signs of illness or distress.
Ensure the living area is dry and comfortable.
Groom the goat lightly to remove loose hair.
Secure the goat if necessary, for examination or transportation.
